channel.title: If A Player Is In An Area
channel.description: I know someone posted a TUT awhile back for checking if there are any players in a certain area. Does anyone have the link to that?

item.title: If A Player Is In An Area
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

You’re a CM, yet you don’t know how to loop? JESUS. Here:

for (int i = 0; i < maxPlayers; i++) { if (playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (playerHandler.players[i].absX >= #### && playerHandler.players[i].absX <= ####) { if (playerHandler.players[i].absY >= #### && playerHandler.players[i].absY <= ####) { //Do the crap you want here } } } }

Read full topic
item.source: If A Player Is In An Area
